snippet: The woman, who was driving a stolen vehicle and out on bail on charges of kidnapping and attempted murder, was shot as an officer attempted to take control of her vehicle, police said.
abstract: Woman driving a stolen vehicle is fatally shot by a plainclothes New York City police detective after she ran a series of red lights and then scrambled to evade police in the East Flatbush section of Brooklyn; name of victim is not released and an internal investigation has been initiated.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and WENDY RUDERMAN

lead_paragraph: The woman, who was driving a stolen vehicle and out on bail on charges of kidnapping and attempted murder, was shot as an officer attempted to take control of her vehicle, police said.

headline.seo: Woman Shot by Police in Brooklyn After Car Crash
headline.main: Shot by Officer After Car Crash, Woman Dies
headline.print_headline: Officer Fatally Shoots Woman After Crash in Brooklyn
